channel.title: Girl
channel.description:
She's gorgeous. I have no idea how to talk to her, or what to talk to her about. I don't know why, but I can never really find the confidence to talk to her.
Any help?

item.title: Girl
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“purestmage74, post:48, topic:420176”]How would I know?
Because if you look around the forums all you’re seeing is people with 10 rep who have just joined and creating accounts back to back to back asking for help spamming…

Creating random ass topics just to be a post whore.
Posting pictures of swatstickas, racist shit, porn pictures.
Seen it happen to forums before, eventually all the older people take off find some some real shit do to, involve themselves in a community, or make their own.

For fucks sake, i’m not even registered on Ru ne l0cus, and it seems to be more helpful there.
Less little kids who like to retaliate, sittin behind your computer.
Internets lovely for flaming, so simple, just sit behind your computer find some shit to say.[/quote]

I think you’re missing the point that no one is forcing you to stay here, and you aren’t contributing anything to the community either by calling it shit.

Read full topic

And, I’m not asking for help because I’m under-age; I’m asking for help because I need it. It can’t get any more logical than that.

item.title: Girl
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:29, topic:420176”][quote author=r0ckstar96 link=topic=522734.msg3802162#msg3802162 date=1320109717]
Have you tried just saying “hai” to her and seeing where the conversation goes?
Just walk up to her one day and start a conversation by saying “Hai”, or “Ohai, can you help me with yesterday’s homework?”, or “Aren’t you going as [insert random halloween costume name here] for halloween?”, or maybe even “Hey, didn’t I see you at [insert store name here] the other day?”, or you could just walk by her one day and be like “Ayy [girl’s name here], lookin’ good” and keep walking, maybe give her a wink as you’re walking by.
Or you could do what I do: Flip a coin (tails I talk to her, heads I don’t) and then keep flipping the coin until I get tails and then never talk to her because I’m shy
[/quote]
Actually, nice ideas. Thanks.
especially the last one. I’m uber shy aswell[/quote]
If you do talk to her, just be calm, don’t sweat it, and don’t forget to be yourself

Read full topic
